name: 炼金：鞑契
description: 炼金：鞑契共30张卡牌，将于2025年4月30日上线万智牌：竞技场。感谢轻脚翻译并制作中文卡图。

cards.name: Hamza, Might of the Yathan
cards.text:
Whenever a creature you control is turned face up, it `endures` X, where X is that creature's toughness.
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, `seek` a creature card and `manifest` it.
cards.zhs_text:
每当一个由你操控的生物翻回正面时，它`续战`X，X为该生物的防御力。
地落～每当一个由你操控的地进场时，`取出`一张生物牌并`显化`它。

cards.name: Dragonblood Twins
cards.text:
`Double team`
Flurry — Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, until end of turn, this creature has base power and toughness 4/4 and gains `flying`.
cards.zhs_text:
`双打`
连咒～每当你施放每回合中你的第二个咒语时，直到回合结束，此生物的基础力量与防御力为4/4且获得`飞行`异能。

cards.name: Thunderbond Vanguard
cards.text:
Thunderbond Vanguard's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
Each creature token you control enters as a copy of this creature.
cards.zhs_text:
霆绊先锋的力量和防御力各等同于由你操控的生物数量。
每个由你操控的衍生生物均当成此生物的复制品来进场。

cards.name: Pampered Loamfrill
cards.text:
`Deathtouch`
Renew — {1}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: `Conjure` a duplicate of another target creature card in your graveyard onto the top of your library. The duplicate `perpetually` gets +1/+1 and gains `deathtouch`. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.zhs_text:
`死触`
复新～{1}{G}，从你坟墓场放逐此牌：将另一个目标你坟墓场中之生物牌的一张副本`幻变`进你的牌库顶。该副本`永久`得+1/+1且获得`死触`异能。只能于法术时机起动。

cards.name: Call the Crash
cards.text:
`Suspend` 2—{1}{W}{B}{G}
`Conjure` two cards named `Siege Rhino:0` onto the battlefield.
cards.zhs_text:
`延缓`2～{1}{W}{B}{G}
将两张名称为`攻城犀牛:0`的牌`幻变`进战场。

cards.name: Sibsig's Artisan
cards.text: Renew — {1}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put three +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. It `perpetually` gains this ability. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.zhs_text: 复新～{1}{B}{B}，从你坟墓场放逐此牌：在目标由你操控的生物上放置三个+1/+1指示物。其`永久`获得此异能。只能于法术时机起动。

cards.name: Audacious Knuckleblade
cards.zhs_type: 生物～食人魔 / 战士 / 法术师
cards.text:
`Exhaust` — {2}{G}: `Seek` a card named Audacious Knuckleblade and put it onto the battlefield tapped.
`Exhaust` — {1}{U}: `Surveil` 2, then untap this creature.
`Exhaust` — {R}: Creatures you control gain `haste` until end of turn.
cards.zhs_text:
`竭绝`～{2}{G}：`取出`一张名称为斗胆指套剑手的牌并将它横置放进战场。
`竭绝`～{1}{U}：`刺探`2，然后重置此生物.
`竭绝`～{R}：由你操控的生物获得`敏捷`异能直到回合结束。

cards.name: Oasis of Renewal
cards.text:
When Oasis of Renewal enters and whenever a land card leaves your graveyard, `seek` a land card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
When Oasis of Renewal enters and whenever a nonland card leaves your graveyard, `seek` a nonland card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
cards.zhs_text:
当复新绿洲进场和每当一张地牌离开你的坟墓场时，`取出`一张地牌。此异能每回合只会触发一次。
当复新绿洲进场和每当一张非地牌离开你的坟墓场时，`取出`一张非地牌。此异能每回合只会触发一次。

cards.name: Lam, Strom Crane Elder
cards.text:
`Prowess`
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, `conjure` a card named `Monastery Mentor:0` onto the battlefield.
cards.zhs_text:
`灵技`
每当你施放非生物咒语时，将一张名称为`寺院明师:0`的牌`幻变`进战场。

cards.name: Xho Cai, Flickering Talon
cards.text:
`Flying`, `Vigilance`, `Haste`
When Xho Cai enters, the next noncreature spell you cast costs {1} less to cast.
Flurry — Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, exile up to one target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
cards.zhs_text:
`飞行`，`警戒`，`敏捷`
当许才进场时，你施放的下一个非生物咒语减少{1}来施放。
连咒～每当你施放每回合中你的第二个咒语时，放逐至多一个目标由你操控的生物，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

cards.name: Swiftspear's Teachings
cards.text:
You get a one-time boon with "When you cast a creature spell, it gains `prowess` and `haste`."
Draw a card.
cards.zhs_text:
你获得具有以下异能的一次性恩泽～「当你施放生物咒语时，它获得`灵技`与`敏捷`异能。」
抓一张牌。

cards.name: Illuminating Lash
cards.text:
Illuminating Lash deals 3 damage to any target.
You get a one-time boon with "When you cast a noncreature spell, draw a card."
cards.zhs_text:
闪焰鞭对任意一个目标造成3点伤害。
你获得具有以下异能的一次性恩泽～「当你施放非生物咒语时，抓一张牌。」

cards.name: Waystone's Guidance
cards.text:
Attacking tokens you control get +1/+0.
Whenever you cast your first creature spell each turn, that spell gains `mobilize` 2.
cards.zhs_text:
由你操控且进行攻击的衍生物得+1/+0。
每当你施放每回合中你的第一个生物咒语时，该咒语获得`动员`2。

cards.name: Ureni's Counsel
Cunning Azurescale
cards.text:
`Flash`
`Flying`
When this creature enters, secretly choose land or nonland. `Seek` two cards of the chosen kind.
cards.zhs_text:
`闪现`
`飞行`
当此生物进场时，私下选择地或非地。`取出`两张所选种类的牌。
cards.text2: Secretly choose land or nonland. `Seek` a card of the chosen kind.
cards.zhs_text2: 私下选择地或非地。`取出`一张所选种类的牌。

cards.name: Pearl Lake Warden
cards.text:
As long as this card is the top card of your library, you may look at it any time and you may cast it.
`Flying`
cards.zhs_text:
只要此牌是你的牌库顶牌，你便可以随时检视此牌并施放它。
`飞行`
cards.text2: `Seek` a land card and put it onto the battlefield.
cards.zhs_text2: `取出`一张地牌并将它置入战场。

cards.name: Stonehide Ancient
cards.text:
`Flying`, `Vigilance`
When this creature enters, return all non-Dragon creatures to their owners' hands.
cards.zhs_text:
`飞行`，`警戒`
当此生物进场时，将所有非龙生物移回其拥有者手上。
cards.text2:
Warning Tremor deals 2 damage to any target.
The next Dragon spell you cast costs {2} less to cast.
cards.zhs_text2:
示警冲击对任意一个目标造成2点伤害。
你施放的下一个龙咒语减少{2}来施放。

cards.name: Dragonsoul Prodigy
cards.text: Whenever you cast your first Omen spell each turn, `conjure` a duplicate of that card onto the battlefield. It gains `haste`. At the beginning of the next end step, shuffle it into its owner's library.
cards.zhs_text: 每当你施放每回合中你的第一个预兆咒语时，将该牌的一张副本`幻变`进战场。它获得`敏捷`异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它洗入其拥有者的牌库。

cards.name: Dragonweave Tapestry
cards.text:
When this artifact enters, `conjure` Dragonweave Tapestry's spellbook into your library twice, then shuffle.
Whenever you cast a Dragon or Omen spell, draw a card.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
cards.zhs_text:
当此神器进场时，将龙纹挂卷的法术书`幻变`进你的牌库两次，然后洗牌。
每当你施放龙或预兆咒语时，抓一张牌。
{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。

cards.name: Dragon Typhoon
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a Dragon or noncreature spell, `draft` a card from Dragon Typhoon's spellbook and put it onto the battlefield.
Channel — {2}{R}{R}, Discard this card: Create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with `flying`.
cards.zhs_text:
每当你施放龙或非生物咒语时，从聚龙台风的法术书中`抽选`一张牌并将之放进战场。
循环～{2}{R}{R}，弃掉此牌：派出一个4/4红色，具`飞行`异能的龙衍生生物。

cards.name: Betor's Edict
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may `behold` a Dragon creature.
Destroy target nonland permanent. If a Dragon creature was beheld, it `perpetually` gets +2/+2.
cards.zhs_text:
你可以`请援`龙生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
消灭目标非地永久物。如果已请援龙生物，则它`永久`得+2/+2。

cards.name: Dracomic Fealty
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may `behold` a Dragon.
Target player discards a card with the greatest mana value among cards in their hand. If a Dragon was beheld, exile that player's graveyard.
cards.zhs_text:
你可以`请援`龙，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
目标牌手弃一张牌，须为其手牌中法术力值最大者。如果已请援龙，放逐该牌手的坟墓场。

cards.name: Mardu Thunderkite
cards.text:
`Flying`
`Mobilize` 2
When this creature enters, creatures you control `perpetually` gain your choice of `menace`, `lifelink`, or `haste`.
cards.zhs_text:
`飞行`
`动员`2
当此生物进场时，由你操控的生物依你的选择`永久`获得`威慑`，`系命`或`敏捷`异能。

cards.name: Dalkovan Outrider
cards.text:
`Mobilize` 2
Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, the topmost creature card in your library `perpetually` gets +1/+1.
cards.zhs_text:
`动员`2
每当你牺牲一个永久物时，你牌库最顶上的生物牌`永久`得+1/+1。

cards.name: Runeblade Raiser
cards.text:
This creature enters tapped.
When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. It `perpetually` loses this ability.
cards.zhs_text:
此生物须横置进场。
当此生物死去时，将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。它`永久`失去此异能。

cards.name: Hardened Bonds
cards.text: Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put on a creature you control, `seek` a creature card. That card `perpetually` gains "This creature enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it." This ability triggers only once each turn.
cards.zhs_text: 每当在一个由你操控的生物上放置+1/+1指示物时，`取出`一张生物牌。该牌`永久`获得「此生物进场时上面额外有一个+1/+1指示物。」此异能每回合只会触发一次。

cards.name: Amber-Plate Ainok
cards.text:
`Double team`
At the beginning of your second main phase, if this creature is tapped, it `endures` 1.
cards.zhs_text:
`双打`
在你的第二个行动阶段开始时，若此生物已横置，则它`续战`1。

cards.name: Song of Seasons
cards.text: `Seek` a Mountain card, a Forest card, and a non-Mountain, non-Forest land card. Put one of them onto the battlefield and put one of them into your graveyard.
cards.zhs_text: `取出`一张山脉牌，一张树林牌和一张非山脉且非树林的地牌。将其中一张放进战场，一张置于你的坟墓场。

cards.name: Stormforged Armor
cards.text:
Equipped creature has "Whenever this creature attacks, `conjure` a card named `Ball Lightning:0` onto the battlefield tapped and attacking."
`Equip`—Pay 3 life.
cards.zhs_text:
佩带此武具的生物具有「每当此生物攻击时，将一张名称为`爆雷炼球:0`的牌`幻变`进战场，其为横置且正进行攻击。」
`佩带`～支付3点生命。

cards.name: Desert Cenote
cards.text:
If you were the starting player, this land enters tapped.
As this land enters, choose up to two colors from among cards in your hand.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of a chosen color.
cards.zhs_text:
如果你是先手牌手，则此地须横置进场。
于此地进场时，从你的手牌中选出至多两种颜色。
{T}：加{C}。
{T}：加一点所选颜色的法术力。
